title: Electric field of square charge configuration

content.question: The four charged particles shown above are held fixed at the corners of a square. The electric field at point P, the center of the square, is directed

choices.label: out of the plane of the page
toward the bottom of the page
toward the top of the page

content.answer: toward the top of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
